title: I am not receiving notifications through mobile data, any idea?
content: I have made a factory reset with wipe factory option in recovery mode. I have not migrated nothing from other phone, I have a clean installation and notification to my applications, like gmail, are not received with mobile data, with wifi everything works fine. Any ideas or suggestions? Thanks in advance!! (Of course I have full connectivity with mobile data)
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
